error.unknown_desc: There was an issue, see the console for more info

not_found.event: The requested event was not found.

magic_login.desc: A magic link will be sent to your email to authenticate
magic_login.sent: If a user exists with this email, you should receive a link to connect
magic_login.rate_limit: Please wait before trying to login again!

fail.title: An error occured
fail.desc_unknown: An unknown error has occured, see console for more details

success.title: User created
success.desc: You registered {{username}}, an email will be sent to their inbox to login.

confirm.title: You are trying to ban {{username}}
confirm.desc: They will no longer be able to login. Existing tokens will still work for 15 minutes.

ban.error_desc: An error occured while banning this user. More info in the console.

confirm.title: You are trying to unban {{username}}
confirm.desc: They will be able to login again.

unban.error_desc: An error occured while unbanning this user. More info in the console.

bad_format.title: The format is invalid
bad_format.description: Please only use jpg, webp and png files.

failed.title: Cover update failure
failed.description: The cover was not updated. See console for more infos.

bad_format.title: The format is invalid
bad_format.description: Please use the correct format depending on the file you want to upload

failed.title: Upload failed
failed.description: The upload has failed. See console for more infos.

compile.title: Compilation settings
compile.text1: A song can be either uncompiled (extracted, ready to be edited) or compiled (a .phk file is generated and edition is locked).
compile.text2: Here you can request to compile / decompile your song
compile.text3: Note that decompiling the song will remove it from all the appliances that fetched it, and rebuilding it will cause the appliance to fetch it again.

failure_compile.title: Failed to compile
failure_compile.description: The song was not compiled. Look at the console for more infos

failure_decompile.title: Failed to decompile
failure_decompile.description: The song was not decompiled. Look at the console for more infos

conclude.title: You are going to conclude the event
conclude.description: This will start the export of the event and it will be locked for modification. You must do this only after the event is over.

success.title: The event is concluded
success.description: The event will now be exported. Please wait, an email will be sent to participant once ready.

failed.title: Failed to conclude the event
failed.description: Failure when concluding the event. The event will not be exported

delete.title: Kicking a user
delete.description: You are going to kick {{name}} from the event.

failure.title: Kick failed
failure.description: An error occured while kicking {{name}} out of the event.

failure.title: Adding failed
failure.description: An error occured while adding the user to the event.

failure.title: Searching failed
failure.description: An error occured while searching for a user.
